abstract: Attorneys for former New York State Sen Dean G Skelos and his son, Adam B Skelos, who were both convicted on corruption charges, have filed unusual, and risky, requests for community service rather than prison time.

headline.print_headline: Experts Find Risks, and Logic, in Skeloses’ Appeal for No Prison Time
headline.main: Experts See Risks, and Logic, in Skeloses’ Appeal for No Prison Time

snippet: Prosecutors are likely to seek stiff prison sentences for Dean G. Skelos, the former majority leader of the New York State Senate, and his son, Adam, who were both convicted on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors are likely to seek stiff prison sentences for Dean G. Skelos, the former majority leader of the New York State Senate, and his son, Adam, who were both convicted on corruption charges.
